scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && echo '✅ Frontend configured for development'
scripts.staging: npm run build:staging && echo '✅ Frontend configured for staging'
scripts.prod: npm run build:prod && echo '✅ Frontend configured for production'
scripts.start: npm run dev && npm run serve
scripts.start:staging: npm run staging && npm run serve:node
scripts.start:prod: npm run prod && npm run serve:node
scripts.validate:config: node -e "require('./config/environments.js'); console.log('✅ All environment configurations are valid')"
scripts.deploy:staging: npm run clean && npm run staging && npm run info
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run clean && npm run prod && npm run info
